wordGroup: metabolic disorder 代谢障碍，代谢失调
metabolic disease 代谢性疾病；代谢病
metabolic activity 代谢活动；新陈代谢活动
metabolic acidosis 代谢性酸中毒
basal metabolic rate 基础心尘代谢率
metabolic intermediate 代谢中间（产）物

sentences.en: People who have inherited a low metabolic rate will gain weight.
sentences.cn: 因遗传而新陈代谢速度慢的人会发胖。

sentences.en: Your metabolic rate is the speed at which your body transforms food into energy.
sentences.cn: 你的新陈代谢率就是你身体将食物转换成能量的速度。
他们的新陈代谢率很低。
